fields.headline: Rounding up the week
fields.bodyText: Monday Congratulations Greg! "Northerners love PSP the most," says Comet America embraces Nintendogs Tuesday Too many conferences PSP batters UK launch records Wednesday Gaming for good Thursday When developers pull the plug Lumines and Meteos go even more mobile You'd never guess... Gadget worry Friday We love the Katamari website No fun at all Sonic Friday!
